ygData.subject: Re: Bard Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are you certain you are healing faster just because the icon is on the screen? This did not used to be the case in beta when I last checked.  You used to
ygData.messageBody:
Ryan wrote:

> From: "Ryan" <Natu@...>
>
> Well what I normally do is have my healing song going then let it go for one
> round so the icon appears at the top then switch to my bellows spell and
> once I hit with that switch back over to healing song.. As long as the Icon
> is still on the screen you heal faster.. Thats just my method :)

Are you certain you are healing faster just because the icon is on the screen?
This did not used to be the case in beta when I last checked. You used to only
heal at the increased rate when the words "your wounds begin to heal" appeared.

Jyzan
